PageTitle: display configuration candidate (All views except the user view)
FuncDef:
The display configuration candidate changes command displays the difference between the candidate configuration and current running configuration.
The display configuration candidate merge command displays all configurations, including uncommitted and committed ones. The display configuration candidate changes command displays the difference between the candidate configuration and current running configuration. The display configuration candidate merge command displays all configurations, including uncommitted and committed ones.
ParentView: All views except the user view
ExtraInfo:
Before committing configurations, you can run the display configuration candidate changes command to view the difference between the modified configuration and the current running configuration.
The display configuration candidate changes command displays the difference between the uncommitted configuration in the candidate database and the running configuration in the running database. If any difference exists, the command output is as follows:
